required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: HerzCheck- Detection of Early Heart Failure Using Telemedicine in Structurally Weak Regions
clinical_study.official_title: HerzCheck- Erkennung Und Prävention Einer frühen Herzinsuffizienz Mittels Telemedizinischer Verfahren in Strukturschwachen Regionen

collaborator.agency: Medical Statistics, University Medicine of Goettingen

brief_summary.textblock: This study is intended to provide a basis for decision-making for the improved medical care of patients with asymptomatic heart failure, especially in structurally weak regions.

detailed_description.textblock: The aim of the study is the early detection of asymptomatic heart failure with a quality-assured cardiac screening MRI in the population in structurally weak regions and especially in patients with risk factors for the occurrence of heart failure. The diagnosis will be followed by early initiation of appropriate therapeutic measures to improve the prognosis of the affected patients, avoid hospitalisations and save therapy costs, and will be combined with recommended measures to minimise risk factors for the development of heart failure. The project includes a prospective, monocentric, randomised controlled clinical trial with blinded assessment of the endpoint (PROBE design). Within the scope of the study, 6,600 patients aged between 40 and 69 years who have characteristic risk factors for the development of heart failure will be examined using a mobile cardiac screening MRI in the federal states of Brandenburg and Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania within Germany.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: The present study is a prospective, monocentric, randomised controlled trial with stratification and blinded assessment of the endpoint (Prospective Randomised Open Blinded Endpoint (PROBE) design).
study_design_info.masking_description: The attending physician who examines the patients is blinded.

primary_outcome.description: Improved GLS at after one year compared to baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: Body weight in kilograms and body height in meters will be aggregated to report BMI in kg/m^2
secondary_outcome.description: BMI at baseline compared to after one year.

secondary_outcome.measure: Systolic and diastolic blood pressure in mmHg
secondary_outcome.description: blood pressure at baseline compared to after one year.
heart rate at baseline compared to after one year.

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life questionnaire 1 in Likert scale
secondary_outcome.description: Quality of life at after one year compared to baseline. Min. value: 0, max value: 3; higher score: better outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life questionnaire 2 in Likert scale
secondary_outcome.description: Quality of life at after one year compared to baseline. Min. value: 1, max value: 5; higher score: depending on question.

secondary_outcome.measure: laboratory parameters: Iron, transferrin and creatinine
secondary_outcome.description: laboratory parameters in µmol/l at baseline compared to after one year.

secondary_outcome.measure: laboratory parameters: Sodium, potassium, chloride, total cholesterol, triglycerides, HDL cholesterole, LDL cholesterole, hemoglobin and MCHC
secondary_outcome.description: laboratory parameters in mmol/l at baseline compared to after one year.

secondary_outcome.measure: laboratory parameters: White cells and platelets
secondary_outcome.description: laboratory parameters in GPt/l at baseline compared to after one year.
laboratory parameter in fl at baseline compared to after one year.
laboratory parameter in fl at baseline compared to after one year.
laboratory parameter in mmol/mol at baseline compared to after one year.
laboratory parameter in TPt/l at baseline compared to after one year.
laboratory parameter in fmol at baseline compared to after one year.
laboratory parameter in l/l at baseline compared to after one year.
laboratory parameter in pmol/l at baseline compared to after one year.
laboratory parameter in % at baseline compared to after one year.
laboratory parameter in µg/l at baseline compared to after one year.

secondary_outcome.measure: hospitalisations of cardiac origin, arrhythmias or death
secondary_outcome.description: Appearance of hospitalisations of cardiac origin, arrhythmias or death

clinical_study.condition: Heart Failure With Preserved Ejection Fraction

arm_group.description: In addition to the usual treatment (SoC), the prevention group receives an innovative prevention offer tailored to the severity of the heart failure (telemedical connection via health app as well as additional therapy recommendations).
The control group receives the current standard treatment according to the valid guidelines (Standard of Care = SoC).

intervention.description: Improvement of outcomes through lifestyle changes and improved health literacy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Smoking
- Hypercholesterolaemia
- Arterial hypertension
- Diabetes
- Kidney Insufficiency
- Health insurance
Exclusion Criteria:
- HFrEF
- MRI-exclusion criteria
